titleStmt.title: The coffee house or News-mongers Hall. In which is shewn their several sorts of passions, containing news from all our neighbour nations. A poem.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[dward]. Crowch, for T[homas]. Vere, at the Angel withour New-gate,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "You that delight in wit and mirth ..."
Imperfect: cropped at head with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
